translation: Those who eat the remnants of the sacrifice, which are like nectar, go to the eternal Brahman. This world is not for the one who does not perform sacrifice; how then can they have the other, O Arjuna?
commentary: 4.31 Yajnashishtamritabhujah eaters of the nectar -- the remnants of the sacrifice? go go? Brahma Brahman? eternal eternal? Not not? This is this? Lokah world? Is there is? of the nonsacrificer? Where how? Another other? Kurusattam O best of the Kurus.Commentary They go to the eternal Brahman in course of time after attaining the knowledge of the Self through purification of the mind by performing the above
